name: Scifi Racer Pro
description:
Sci fi Racer is a fun loving game. you are visiting earth of another galaxy in a spaceship. You need to watch out for the trees and old temple and pillars. if you collide with any pillar your spaceship will crash and you will loose. Although that is earth you are visiting but its not the earth of this Galaxy and the rules of physics don't apply exactly the same. You are flying your spacecraft in a zero gravity zone so don't be afraid of falling down just watch out of the obstacles in the way and fly fast .

KEY FEATURES
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic spaceship handling
- Different new spaceships to choose from
- Detailed environment

GAMEPLAY
- Touch to steer
- Buy better ships to have better handling
TIPS
- The longer you fly the more scores you get
- pickup bonus scores and speed
Are you ready for the challenge? Show your friends what a speed demon looks like!

Sci fi Racer will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.
